author: dougm
msg: i didnt make this change (and sure didnt choose the new name! :)

author: rbb
msg: Rename XtOffset to APR_XtOffset.  This namespace protection
is important to keep from conflicting with other packages.

author: stoddard
msg: Put the WSABUFs on the stack in apr_sendv to save a malloc/free call.

author: bjh
msg: OS/2: When a file is opened in append mode, make sure all writes go at the
current end of file, even if the file is being written to by other processes.
